title: Awesome Cheatsheets
description: Explore a curated collection of cheatsheets designed for web developers. Find handy links, collections, lists, guides, and cheatsheets to streamline your development process.

title: Taste Trackr
description: Track your personal ratings of the restaurants you visit or order often. You can login and create a personal rating system for your restaurants.

title: SmartSaver
description: Capstone Project from my high-intense Development Bootcamp. Smart Saver App is an expense tracker. It helps you keep track of your expenses and save money efficiently.
